entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
